parameters.subject: Welcome to Ignite Health Systems - {{ $json.userType === 'physician' ? 'Reclaim Your Practice' : $json.userType === 'investor' ? 'Healthcare Investment Opportunity' : 'Join the Healthcare Revolution' }}
parameters.message:
Dear {{ $json.firstName }},

Thank you for your interest in Ignite Health Systems. We're thrilled to connect with {{ $json.userType === 'physician' ? 'a fellow physician committed to transforming healthcare' : $json.userType === 'investor' ? 'an investor who sees the potential in physician-led healthcare transformation' : 'a specialist passionate about revolutionizing healthcare technology' }}.
